C

Client_02 - Class in Unnamed Package
The Client_02 class implements a simple chat client that connects to a chat server using TCP sockets.

MessageReceiver - Class in Unnamed Package
The MessageReceiver class is responsible for continuously listening for messages from the chat server and printing them to the console.
MessageReceiver(BufferedReader) - Constructor for class MessageReceiver
Constructs a MessageReceiver instance with a given BufferedReader.
MessageSender - Class in Unnamed Package
The MessageSender class is designed to read user input from the console and send it to the chat server.
MessageSender(PrintWriter) - Constructor for class MessageSender
Constructs a MessageSender instance with a given PrintWriter.

S

Server - Class in Unnamed Package
Server class that implements a multi-client chat server using TCP/IP protocol.
Server(int) - Constructor for class Server
Constructor that initializes the server to listen on the specified port.

Starts the chat client, creating and starting threads for sending and receiving messages.
start() - Method in class Server
Starts the server's main loop to accept incoming client connections.
